ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and affirmed the Truth of goodness:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: for those who spend for the cause of God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And believed the best matter to be true
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and confirms the reward most fair,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and believes in the truth of what is right,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And (in all sincerity) testifies to the best,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [92:6]   and affirms the truth of the best [word], that is, [the truth] of ‘there is no god but God’ (in both places [here and below, verse 9]),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And believeth in goodness) and believes in Allah's provision; and it is also said this means: and believes in Paradise; and it is also said this means: and believes in "there is no deity save Allah";
